articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Britain's Joe Joyce loses for first time after being stunned by Zhilei Zhang - The Guardian
articles.description: Joe Joyce lost for the first time in his professional career after being stopped in the sixth round by China’s Zhilei Zhang
articles.content:
Joe Joyce suffered a crushing defeat by Zhilei Zhang after a sixth-round stoppage at the Copper Box Arena in London.
The referee, Howard Foster, called off the contest with Joyce sustaining signific… [+1847 chars]

articles.author: Simon Bajkowski
articles.title: Pep Guardiola responds to Joao Cancelo boos from Man City fans - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola spoke about his full-back being booed while on loan at Bayern Munich
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola suggested that Joao Cancelo had been booed because he was playing against Manchester City after a frosty reception on his return to the Etihad.
